abstract: Shares of Countrywide Financial fell Thursday below the $18 price at which Bank of America may convert its $2 billion investment into common stock. The drop erased the $700 million paper profit Bank of America made when it invested $2 billion in the nation’s biggest mortgage lender two weeks ago.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Countrywide Financial fell Thursday below the $18 price at which Bank of America may convert its $2 billion investment into common stock. The drop erased the $700 million paper profit Bank of America made when it invested $2 billion in the nation’s biggest mortgage lender two weeks ago.

headline.main: Countrywide Drops Below Bank of America’s Deal Price

abstract: Biovail, the Canadian drug maker that is suing nearly two dozen parties for allegedly conspiring to drive its stock price down, has agreed to drop its claim against Bank of America and one of its analysts, The New York Post reported Monday.
lead_paragraph: Biovail, the Canadian drug maker that is suing nearly two dozen parties for allegedly conspiring to drive its stock price down, has agreed to drop its claim against Bank of America and one of its analysts, The New York Post reported Monday.

headline.main: Biovail Is Said to Settle with BofA
